title: A booke called in latyn Enchiridion militis christiani, and in englysshe the manuell of the christen knyght replenysshed with moste holsome preceptes, made by the famous clerke Erasmus of Roterdame, to the whiche is added a newe and meruaylous profytable preface.
author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
publicationStmtPublisher: By wynkyn de worde, for Iohan Byddell, otherwyse Salisbury, the. xv. daye  of Nouembre. And be for to sell at the sygne of our Lady of pytie next to Flete bridge,
